verses.verse: These are the journeys <S%H4550><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which went forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with their armies <S%H6635><s%> under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> their goings out <S%H4161><s%> according to their journeys <S%H4550><s%> by the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: and these are their journeys <S%H4550><s%> according to their goings out <S%H4161><s%>.

And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Rameses <S%H7486><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the fifteenth <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2568><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>; on the morrow <S%H4283><s%> after the passover <S%H6453><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> with an high <S%H7311><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>.

For the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> buried <S%H6912><s%> all their firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had smitten <S%H5221><s%> among them: upon their gods <S%H430><s%> also the LORD <S%H3068><s%> executed <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%>.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> removed <S%H5265><s%> from Rameses <S%H7486><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Succoth <S%H5523><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Succoth <S%H5523><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Etham <S%H864><s%>, which is in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Etham <S%H864><s%>, and turned again <S%H7725><s%> unto Pihahiroth <S%H6367><s%>, which is before Baalzephon <S%H1189><s%>: and they pitched <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Migdol <S%H4024><s%>.

And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Pihahiroth <S%H6367><s%>, and passed through <S%H5674><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Etham <S%H864><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Marah <S%H4785><s%>.

And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Marah <S%H4785><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> unto Elim <S%H362><s%>: and in Elim <S%H362><s%> were twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> fountains <S%H5869><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, and threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> palm trees <S%H8558><s%>; and they pitched <S%H2583><s%> there.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Elim <S%H362><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> by the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin <S%H5512><s%>.
And they took their journey <S%H5265><s%> out of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin <S%H5512><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Dophkah <S%H1850><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Dophkah <S%H1850><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Alush <S%H442><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Alush <S%H442><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Rephidim <S%H7508><s%>, where was no water <S%H4325><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Rephidim <S%H7508><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from the desert <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> at Kibrothhattaavah <S%H6914><s%>. Kibrothhattaavah: that is, the graves of lust
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Kibrothhattaavah <S%H6914><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Hazeroth <S%H2698><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Hazeroth <S%H2698><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Rithmah <S%H7575><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Rithmah <S%H7575><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> at Rimmonparez <S%H7428><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Rimmonparez <S%H7428><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Libnah <S%H3841><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Libnah <S%H3841><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> at Rissah <S%H7446><s%>.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rissah <S%H7446><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Kehelathah <S%H6954><s%>.
And they went <S%H5265><s%> from Kehelathah <S%H6954><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Shapher <S%H8234><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from mount <S%H2022><s%> Shapher <S%H8234><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Haradah <S%H2732><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Haradah <S%H2732><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Makheloth <S%H4722><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Makheloth <S%H4722><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Tahath <S%H8480><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Tahath <S%H8480><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> at Tarah <S%H8646><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Tarah <S%H8646><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Mithcah <S%H4989><s%>.
And they went <S%H5265><s%> from Mithcah <S%H4989><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Hashmonah <S%H2832><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Hashmonah <S%H2832><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Moseroth <S%H4149><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Moseroth <S%H4149><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Benejaakan <S%H1142><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Benejaakan <S%H1142><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Horhagidgad <S%H2735><s%>.
And they went <S%H5265><s%> from Horhagidgad <S%H2735><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Jotbathah <S%H3193><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Jotbathah <S%H3193><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Ebronah <S%H5684><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Ebronah <S%H5684><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Eziongaber <S%H6100><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Eziongaber <S%H6100><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%>, which is Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>, in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> into mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> at the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and died <S%H4191><s%> there, in the fortieth <S%H705><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were come out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, in the first <S%H259><s%> day of the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> was an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he died <S%H4194><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>.

And king <S%H4428><s%> Arad <S%H6166><s%> the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the south <S%H5045><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, heard <S%H8085><s%> of the coming <S%H935><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Zalmonah <S%H6758><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Zalmonah <S%H6758><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Punon <S%H6325><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Punon <S%H6325><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Oboth <S%H88><s%>.
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Oboth <S%H88><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Ijeabarim <S%H5863><s%>, in the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>. Ijeabarim: or, heaps of Abarim
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Iim <S%H5864><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Dibongad <S%H1769><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Dibongad <S%H1769><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Almondiblathaim <S%H5963><s%>.
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Almondiblathaim <S%H5963><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim <S%H5682><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> Nebo <S%H5015><s%>.

And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim <S%H5682><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by Jordan <S%H3383><s%> near Jericho <S%H3405><s%>.

And they pitched <S%H2583><s%> by Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, from Bethjesimoth <S%H1020><s%> even unto Abelshittim <S%H63><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>. Abelshittim: or, the plains of Shittim
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by Jordan <S%H3383><s%> near Jericho <S%H3405><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them, When ye are passed over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>;

Then ye shall drive out <S%H3423><s%> all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, and destroy <S%H6><s%> all their pictures <S%H4906><s%>, and destroy <S%H6><s%> all their molten <S%H4541><s%> images <S%H6754><s%>, and quite pluck down <S%H8045><s%> all their high places <S%H1116><s%>:
And ye shall dispossess <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants of the land <S%H776><s%>, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein: for I have given <S%H5414><s%> you the land <S%H776><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

And ye shall divide <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> among your families <S%H4940><s%>: and to the more <S%H7227><s%> ye shall give the more <S%H7235><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and to the fewer <S%H4592><s%> ye shall give the less <S%H4591><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: every man's inheritance shall be in the place where his lot <S%H1486><s%> falleth <S%H3318><s%>; according to the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> ye shall inherit <S%H5157><s%>. give the more: Heb. multiply his inheritance give the less: Heb. diminish his inheritance

But if ye will not drive out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you; then it shall come to pass, that those which ye let remain <S%H3498><s%> of them shall be pricks <S%H7899><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and thorns <S%H6796><s%> in your sides <S%H6654><s%>, and shall vex <S%H6887><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> wherein ye dwell <S%H3427><s%>.
Moreover it shall come to pass, that I shall do <S%H6213><s%> unto you, as I thought <S%H1819><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> unto them.
